affiliate().notice: The address of the affiliate receiving the earnings.

pay(address).notice: Pays out the earnings to the platform and affiliate.

payVault().notice: The address of the vault that earnings are paid to on behalf of the affiliate and platform.

splitConfig().notice: The address of the affiliate split config.
